page.title: 05FARMING 1
page.content:
The pattern of farm ownership in the area is not readily apparent from the O.S. map. A number of farms are connected, owned by the same people, and the farm buildings do not serve as permanent homesteads, but merely bases for storing farm equipment and produce.
Altogether there are six independant holdings within a twelve square kilometre area. These range from the seven hundred acre spread of MANOR FARM around the village of Wibtoft, to the one hundred and ten acre of COPSTON FIELDS FARM.
